wikipedia_page.main: Bruce Angrave (6 December 1912 – 8 July 1983) was an English illustrator and poster artist. He designed many posters for the large railway companies, as well as posters and cartoons for Ministry of Information during World War II.

response: * Bruce Angrave (1914–1983), British poster artist, illustrator and author
